title: Business interruption insurance claims documentation
dataVerified: Business name, interruption period, lost revenue, extra expenses, adjuster report
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fraudulent business interruption claims (common post-disaster fraud). Domain binding verifies adjuster/forensic accountant. High-value claims ($100K-$10M+). COVID-19 claim disputes. Multi-page: Forensic accounting reports multi-page.
